span.span: Creates an HTTP content stream as an asynchronous operation for reading whose backing store is memory from the .

returns.span: 表示异步操作的任务对象。

span.span: The task object representing the asynchronous operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此操作不会阻止。This operation will not block. 所有内容流都已创建后，返回的对象将完成。The returned object will complete after all of the content stream has been created.

summary.span: 作为一个异步操作，将构造函数中提供的字节数组序列化并写入一个 HTTP 内容流。

span.span: Serialize and write the byte array provided in the constructor to an HTTP content stream as an asynchronous operation.

returns.span: 表示异步操作的任务对象。

span.span: The task object representing the asynchronous operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此操作不会阻止。This operation does not block. 当返回的 对象完成时，整个字节数组已写入 `stream` 参数。When the returned object completes, the whole byte array has been written to the `stream` parameter.

MemberSignature.Value: protected internal override bool TryComputeLength (out long length);
.method familyorassemblyhidebysig virtual instance bool TryComputeLength([out] int64& length) cil managed
Protected Friend Overrides Function TryComputeLength (ByRef length As Long) As Boolean
protected public: override bool TryComputeLength([Runtime::InteropServices::Out] long % length);
override this.TryComputeLength : int64 -> bool

param.name: length
param.span: 字节数组的长度（以字节为单位）。

span.span: The length in bytes of the byte array.

summary.span: 确定字节数组的长度是否有效（以字节为单位）。

span.span: Determines whether a byte array has a valid length in bytes.

returns.span: 如果 是有效长度，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if is a valid length; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法为派生内容类型提供了计算内容长度的能力。The method gives a derived content type the ability to calculate the content length. 这对于能够轻松计算内容长度的内容类型很有用。This is useful for content types which are able to easily calculate the content length. 如果无法计算内容长度，或成本较高 (需要系统缓冲序列化会消耗大量内存的整个内容，或者需要系统分配大量内存) ，则此方法可以返回 `false` 。If computing the content length is not possible or expensive (would require the system to buffer the whole content where the serialization would be expensive or require the system to allocate a lot of memory), this method can return `false`. 如果此方法返回 `false` ，则表示需要分块传输，或者必须在将内容发送到服务器之前缓冲内容。If this method returns `false`, this implies that either chunked transfer is needed or the content must get buffered before being sent to the server. 此方法始终 `true` 为返回 。This method always returned `true` for .
